text: This is a list of finance ministers of Samoa. *Leicester Mitchell Cook, 1952–1959 (Financial Secretary) *Eugene Paul, 1959–1961 *Fred Betham, 1961–1970Thirteenth South Pacific Conference and thirty-sixth session: Curricula vitae of senior SPC staff and senior staff members of UNDP/FAO/SPC projects South Pacific Commission *Tofa Siaosi, 1970–1973 *Sam Saili, 1973–1975 *Aumua Ioane, 1975–1976 *Vaovasamanaia Filipo, 1976–1982 *Tofilau Eti, 1982–1984 *Tuilaepa Aiono Sailele Malielegaoi, 1984–1985 *Faasootauloa Semu Plagi 1985–? *Sam Saili, ?–1986–1987 *Faasootauloa Pualanga, 1987–1988 *Tuilaepa Aiono Sailele Malielegaoi, 1988–2001https://core.ac.uk/download/pdf/143896029.pdf *Misa Telefoni, 2001-2006 *Niko Lee Hang, 2006-2011https://web.archive.org/web/20070824113631/http://www.parliament.gov.ws/popup_mop.cfm?mop=007http://documents1.worldbank.org/curated/en/864751468337231761/pdf/TF0988460Amendment0Conformed.pdf *Faumuina Tiatia Liuga, 2011–2014 *Tuilaepa Aiono Sailele Malielegaoi, 2014–2016 *Sili Epa Tuioti, 2016– ==References== Finance Finance Ministers Politicians
title: Minister of Finance (Samoa)
